Hero.title: Elevate Your Business with Elaf
Hero.description: Elaf is a powerful tender platform that empowers companies to streamline their procurement processes, connect with suppliers, and grow their business.

Features.title: Explore Elaf's Key Features
Features.description: Elaf offers a comprehensive suite of tools to streamline your procurement process and connect with suppliers.

tenderManagement.title: Tender Management
tenderManagement.description: Easily create, publish, and manage tenders on the platform.

supplierProfiles.title: Supplier Profiles
supplierProfiles.description: Discover and connect with qualified suppliers in your industry.

bidManagement.title: Bid Management
bidManagement.description: Streamline the bidding process and evaluate proposals efficiently.

SocialMedia.title: Elevate Your Social Media Presence
SocialMedia.description: Elaf's social media platform allows you to showcase your company, share updates, and engage with potential customers.

companyProfiles.title: Company Profiles
companyProfiles.description: Create a professional company profile to showcase your services and expertise.

socialSharing.title: Social Sharing
socialSharing.description: Share updates, news, and content with your followers and potential clients.

engagementTools.title: Engagement Tools
engagementTools.description: Interact with your audience through comments, likes, and direct messaging.

SignUp.title: Join the Elaf Community
SignUp.description: Sign up today and start leveraging the power of Elaf to grow your business.

Companies.directoryTitle: Company Directory | Elaf - B2B Tenders and Bids
Companies.searchResultsDescription: Explore {totalCompanies} companies matching "{searchTerm}" in the Elaf Company Directory. Find B2B tender and bid opportunities.
Companies.directoryDescription: Discover {totalCompanies} companies for B2B tenders and bids in the Elaf Company Directory.
Companies.keywords: Elaf, B2B, tenders, bids, procurement, supplier directory, Egypt, Oman, company directory, business networks{searchTerm}

ContactForm.title: Contact Us
ContactForm.subtitle: Have a question or need assistance? Fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

ContactHeader.title: Elaf Tender Platform

TenderForm.title: Create New Tender
TenderForm.pdfNote: Note: Adding a PDF file to your tender is required for the review process.
TenderForm.fillRequiredFields: Please fill out all required fields in Step 1.
TenderForm.uploadPDFRequired: Please upload a PDF file for your tender.

PrivacyPolicy.information_we_collect_content: We collect the information you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account, submit a form, or communicate with us.
PrivacyPolicy.how_we_use_your_information_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations.
PrivacyPolicy.information_sharing_content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this privacy policy or with your consent.
PrivacyPolicy.data_security_content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
PrivacyPolicy.your_rights_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also choose to opt out of certain communications or data collection practices.
PrivacyPolicy.changes_to_privacy_policy_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.acceptance_of_terms_content: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.
TermsOfUse.user_accounts_content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account.
TermsOfUse.content_content: Our service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material. You are responsible for the content you post.
TermsOfUse.intellectual_property_content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of our company and its licensors.
TermsOfUse.termination_content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
TermsOfUse.limitation_of_liability_content: In no event shall our company, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.
TermsOfUse.changes_content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

TendersPage.description: Browse and find various tenders from different sectors.

UserProfilePage.companyProfileRequiredDescription: You must create a company profile to make tenders.
